main event: Multiple military personnel observed unidentified flying objects described as point sources of white and yellow light moving at high speeds.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3-5 minutes,Objects traveled at jet-like speeds and disappeared rapidly,Observers reported seeing six to eight objects in a star-like formation,Conditions were bright moonlight night with scattered low clouds,Possible explanation suggested a weather balloon release at a nearby air base.
sighted object: six to eight point sources of white and yellow light
witness description: 2LT J. Bowles, Acting SSGT R.G. Savell, along with other military personnel
